thread.section_title: SSENSE Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SSENSE | ssense.com | 59 of 61
thread.title: James

author: James
title: James
text:
SSENSE always has great pieces and wide availability of sizing options, which is important to me as I wear a men's 44 which is often not available on competitor sites for similar items.
I'm always inspired by the product page styling and content features and easy site navigation. If I had one area of imporvement, I wish they had an app interface like some of their competitors and wishlist/preferences features in the account functions so I could easily keep track of my favorite items from each brand.
